name: William Beauregard Bennett
bio: When William Beauregard Bennett was born on 28 August 1861, in Alabama, United States, his father, William Mathison Bennett, was 32 and his mother, Lavica Ann "Vicie" Curlee, was 26. He had at least 1 son and 1 daughter with Delaney H. Mathews. He lived in Oaky Streak, Butler, Alabama, United States in 1880. He died on 12 February 1893, in Alabama, United States, at the age of 31, and was buried in Bethel Primitive Baptist Church Cemetery, Babbie, Covington, Alabama, United States.
